messages.title: Our next local MP?
messages.content: Nick Holder is the Conservative Parliamentary Candidate for Newcastle Central.

messages.title: A PERSONAL MESSAGE FROM DAVID CAMERON
messages.content: WHY WE NEED CHANGE IN BRITAIN

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Conservatives will work with councils to freeze council tax for two years.
We will cut the cost of politics, with a reduction in the number in MPs and cut ministers' pay.
The Conservatives will enact immigration reform that includes a new annual limit allowing only those who will benefit the economy.
We will keep pensioners' free bus passes, free TV licences and Winter Fuel Allowance and increase the basic state pension by restoring the link to earnings.
We will work hard to open a new technical college on Tyneside.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Liberal Democrats are in third place and the SNP are out of the race.

issues.education: High quality education for all and supporting families.
issues.health: Protecting and strengthening the NHS with year on year funding increases.

quotes.text: Only by voting for Nick Holder can we achieve the change we need.

images.caption: Nick Holder with residents and various campaign images.
